hero.title: Fast Fluid Stable
hero.description: GenesisOS is a custom ROM based on AOSP with nifty little Quality of Life features to enhance your daily driving experience.

features.title: Google Apps
features.description: Gives you the best experience of seamless data backup and restore. Enjoy the exclusive AI features from Google.

features.title: Up To Date
features.description: GenesisOS always ships with the latest AOSP security patch and android version so that your device doesnâ€™t miss out the latest features from Android.

features.title: OTA Support
features.description: Inbuilt updater helps your device get update on the fly. Just flash GenesisOS once and forget.
